page.title: 15GOLFING IN EDINBURGH.
page.content: Edinburgh is regarded as one of the golfing centres of the world. It is thought that golf actually started just outside Edinburgh,in Musselburgh. There are some 21 courses within the city boundaries and a similar number within easy reach of the city. One of these courses is the famous Muirfield which hosts the Open Championships and which attracts the best players from all over the world. Amongst the most interesting of the courses is Braid Hills, run by the corporation, and regarded as an excellent test of golf by all those who play on it. Murrayfield Golf Course is situated on one side of Corstorphine Hill. From here there is a spectacular view of Edinburgh Castle and Fife. The quality of these courses has made Edinburgh the envy of the golfing world.
